name: RRRRUScared ?
description:
RRRR U Scared is a pirate game where you sail your very own pirate ship !

Sail you way through many waves of mortal ennemies ! (pun intended)

But behold the kraken ! It is as dangerous as it is cute !

Some nice menuing !

Our team was composed of :

-Broux Elian as Programmer

-Chalivat Quentin as Programmer/Game Designer

-Diringer Léo as Tech Artist/VFX artist

-Lorca Adriana as Animator/Modelling
